sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Form, FormControl, FormGroup , FormLabel, Container, Button } from 'react-bootstrap';
function ActivityForm() {
	return (
		<Container>
			<Form>
				<FormGroup className='mb-1'>
					<FormControl type="text" placeholder="Title" />
				</FormGroup >
				<FormGroup >
					<Form.Text placeholder="Descripcion" />
				</FormGroup >
				<FormGroup >
					<FormControl type="text" placeholder="Category" />
				</FormGroup >
				<FormGroup >
					<FormControl type="text" placeholder="Date" />
				</FormGroup >
				<FormGroup >
					<FormControl type="text" placeholder="City" />
				</FormGroup >
				<FormGroup >
					<FormControl type="text" placeholder="Venue" />
				</FormGroup >
				<FormGroup >
					<Button type="submit">Change</Button>
					<Button>Cancel</Button>
				</FormGroup >
			</Form>
		</Container>
	);
}
export default ActivityForm;
